TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-aepipen, title = nipaluma-aepipen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-aepipen} }

S.FORM: == aepipen == u siwkay nu nipaluma pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u cudad a ngangan: u sapamat a ngangan: u Amilika a ngangan: u zuma a cidekay a kamu Pangcha: x Tayan: x Sejek: x Paywan: Taluku: x Yuwatan: lipun patuiia tu ismud Rukay: ivivigi Cou: cuun 'aripangtun Kabalan: x Kanakanabu: x Laaluwa: x Saysia: x Puyuma: Saw: x Tau: x u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam 山菅蘭 sancianlan u sulit nu Lipun u sulit nu Amilika saungay misapayu' a cidekay Yuwatan, Sakizaya, Cou u zuma a cidekay cay katineng mukan atu musapayu' tina nipaluma

== aepipen == o siwkay no nipaloma pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o codad a ngangan: o sapamat a ngangan: o Amilika a ngangan: o zoma a cidekay a kamo Pangcha: x Tayan: x Sejek: x Paywan: Taloko: x Yowatan: lipon patoiia to ismod Rokay: ivivigi Coo: coon 'aripangton Kabalan: x Kanakanabo: x Laalowa: x Saysia: x Poyoma: Saw: x Tao: x o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam 山菅蘭 sancianlan o solit no Lipon o solit no Amilika saongay misapayo' a cidekay Yowatan, Sakizaya, Coo o zoma a cidekay cay katineng mokan ato mosapayo' tina nipaloma
